attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We urge the Prime Minister to support the campaign for a National Cake Day. It seems there's a day set aside for almost everything else, except cakes. While we endorse healthy eating, we feel it only right the Great British cake should get some recognition and hope the Prime Minister will support the Cake Day Campaign on BBC Radio Humberside's Breakfast Show.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
